00023 #include "application.hpp"
00024 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>

00026 #define STR(s) _xstr_(s)
00027 #define _xstr_(s) std::string(#s)

00033 
00034 Application::Application( const char name[] ): m_name( name )
00035 {
00036     Selection dbg_levels( "error,warning,notice,info,verbose_info" );
00037     dbg_levels.set( "warning" );
00038     parameters["dCore"] = dbg_levels;
00039     parameters["dCore"].setDescription( "Debugging level for the Core module" );
00040     parameters["dCore"].hidden() = true;
00041 
00042     parameters["dData"] = dbg_levels;
00043     parameters["dData"].setDescription( "Debugging level for the Data module" );
00044     parameters["dData"].hidden() = true;
00045 
00046     parameters["dImageIO"] = dbg_levels;
00047     parameters["dImageIO"].setDescription( "Debugging level for the ImageIO module" );
00048     parameters["dImageIO"].hidden() = true;
00049 
00050     parameters["help"] = false;
00051     parameters["help"].setDescription( "Print help" );
00052     BOOST_FOREACH( ParameterMap::reference ref, parameters ) //none of these is needed
00053     ref.second.needed() = false;
00054 }
00055 Application::~Application() {}
00056 
00057 bool Application::init( int argc, char **argv, bool exitOnError )
00058 {
00059     bool err = false;
00060     m_filename = argv[0];
00061 
00062     if ( parameters.parse( argc, argv ) ) {
00063         if ( parameters["help"] ) {
00064             printHelp( true );
00065             exit( 0 );
00066         }
00067     } else {
00068         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to parse the command line";
00069         err = true;
00070     }
00071 
00072     if ( ! parameters.isComplete() ) {
00073         std::cerr << "Missing parameters: ";
00074 
00075         for ( ParameterMap::iterator iP = parameters.begin(); iP != parameters.end(); iP++ ) {
00076             if ( iP->second.isNeeded() ) {std::cerr << "-" << iP->first << "  ";}
00077         }
00078 
00079         std::cerr << std::endl;
00080         err = true;
00081     }
00082 
00083     if( parameters["dCore"].isSet() ) {
00084         setLog<CoreDebug>( ( LogLevel )( uint16_t )parameters["dCore"]->as<Selection>() ); //trigger explicit cast from Selection to int and then to LogLevel
00085         setLog<CoreLog>( ( LogLevel )( uint16_t )parameters["dCore"]->as<Selection>() );
00086     }
00087 
00088     if( parameters["dData"].isSet() ) {
00089         setLog<DataDebug>( ( LogLevel )( uint16_t )parameters["dData"]->as<Selection>() );
00090         setLog<DataLog>( ( LogLevel )( uint16_t )parameters["dData"]->as<Selection>() );
00091     }
00092 
00093     if( parameters["dImageIO"].isSet() ) {
00094         setLog<ImageIoDebug>( ( LogLevel )( uint16_t )parameters["dImageIO"]->as<Selection>() );
00095         setLog<ImageIoLog>( ( LogLevel )( uint16_t )parameters["dImageIO"]->as<Selection>() );
00096     }
00097 
00098     if ( err ) {
00099         printHelp();
00100 
00101         if( exitOnError ) {
00102             std::cerr << "Exiting..." << std::endl;
00103             exit( 1 );
00104         }
00105     }
00106 
00107     return ! err;
00108 }
00109 void Application::printHelp( bool withHidden )const
00110 {
00111     std::cerr << this->m_name << " (using isis " << getCoreVersion() << ")" << std::endl;
00112     std::cerr << "Usage: " << this->m_filename << " <options>, where <options> includes:" << std::endl;
00113 
00114     for ( ParameterMap::const_iterator iP = parameters.begin(); iP != parameters.end(); iP++ ) {
00115         std::string pref;
00116 
00117         if ( iP->second.isNeeded() ) {
00118             pref = ". Required.";
00119         } else if( iP->second.isHidden() ) {
00120             if( !withHidden )
00121                 continue; // if its hidden, not needed, and wie want the short version skip this parameter
00122         }
00123 
00124         if ( ! iP->second.isNeeded() ) {
00125             pref = ". Default: \"" + iP->second.toString() + "\"";
00126         }
00127 
00128         std::cerr << "\t-" << iP->first << " <" << iP->second->getTypeName() << ">" << std::endl;
00129 
00130         if ( iP->second->is<Selection>() ) {
00131             const Selection &ref = iP->second->castTo<Selection>();
00132             std::cerr << "\t\tOptions are: " <<  ref.getEntries() << std::endl;
00133         }
00134 
00135         std::cerr << "\t\t" << iP->second.description() << pref << std::endl;
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00139 boost::shared_ptr< _internal::MessageHandlerBase > Application::getLogHandler( std::string /*module*/, isis::LogLevel level )const
00140 {
00141     return boost::shared_ptr< _internal::MessageHandlerBase >( level ? new util::DefaultMsgPrint( level ) : 0 );
00142 }
00143 const std::string Application::getCoreVersion( void )
00144 {
00145 #ifdef ISIS_RCS_REVISION
00146     return STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MAJOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MINOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_PATCH ) + " [" + STR( ISIS_RCS_REVISION ) + "]";
00147 #else
00148     return STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MAJOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MINOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_PATCH );
00149 #endif
00150 }
00151 
00152 }
00153 }
